Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   Orange-red header text in Arabic (translation of "1 Safety Instructions").
*   Red underline beneath the header text.
*   Black note text in Arabic (translation of "Note: Before using this product, please carefully read the following important safety information.").
*   Black instruction 1 text in Arabic (translation of "1.This electric scooter can be used by one adult only. Never carry others.").
*   Black instruction 2 text in Arabic (translation of "2.Wear safety helmet and other protective equipment while using this product.").
*   First light grey rounded rectangular illustration panel.
*   Red "X" in a circle icon, located in the top-left of the first illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of two people on one electric scooter, side view, within the first illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of two people on one electric scooter, front view, within the first illustration panel.
*   Second light grey rounded rectangular illustration panel.
*   Red checkmark in a circle icon, located in the top-left of the second illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of a person's head in profile wearing a helmet, within the second illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of protective pads (e.g., knee/elbow pads), within the second illustration panel.
*   Black instruction 3 text in Arabic (translation of "3.Never ride this product in an unsafe or illegal place.").
*   Black instruction 4 text in Arabic (translation of "4.Please practice in an open area (not on lanes) first and use this product until you are skilled in operation.").
*   Third light grey rounded rectangular illustration panel.
*   Red "X" in a circle icon, located in the top-left of the third illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of a "no scooter" traffic sign on a post, within the third illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of a person on an electric scooter riding past the sign, side view, with motion lines, within the third illustration panel.
*   Fourth light grey rounded rectangular illustration panel.
*   Red "X" in a circle icon, located in the top-left of the fourth illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of a person on an electric scooter, front view, on a road, within the fourth illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of a car, front view, on the road, within the fourth illustration panel.
*   Line drawing illustration of road lane markings, within the fourth illustration panel.
*   Black page number in Arabic numeral (representing the number 2), located at the bottom left of the page.
